page.title: 11Games we play
page.content: Kerbsie-is a game for two people.You need a football and a stretch of road with kerbs on both sides.The object is to hit your opponents kerb with the ball.If you do you score one point. Kickball Rounders-is a game for two sides with any number on each side.One side fields and the bowler on that side rolls the ball to the first person on the other side who has to kick it as far as they can and run round the posts.You can stop at any of the posts.You are out by being stumped or caught. Over Shoulder-a person throws a ball over their shoulder and one person of the people behind has to hide the ball on them.The throwing person turns round and has to guess who has hidden the ball on them.
